info.name: INSTAGRAM (FULL WIDTH POSTS AND MORE)
info.description: makes instagram look better. for features read below!
info.additionalInfo:
FEATURES:
  1. full width posts
  2. hides stories and following on homepage
  3. roboto set as font
  4. highlights on profiles are centered
  5. new scrollbar
  6. the header doesn't stick when you reach posts
  7. posts on homepage have a bigger border radius


code has comments in it so you can easily remove anything you don't like by deleting everything from the beginning of the line with the comment (/* this is a comment */) to the first right brace (})
for example, if i do not want the default font to be roboto i would remove 
body /* roboto as font */ {

    font-family:roboto;

    text-rendering:geometricPrecision;

}

to remove the scrollbar, delete everything from 
/* scrollbar css*/
to 
/* scrollbar css end */

inspiration for full width posts
